choose.when: WHERE category LIKE '%'||#{category}||'%' OR question LIKE '%'||#{question}||'%'

mapper.select: SELECT result1.* FROM (SELECT faq_num,category,question,answer, LAG(faq_num, 1, 0) OVER (ORDER BY faq_num DESC) nextNum, LEAD(faq_num, 1, 0) OVER (ORDER BY faq_num DESC) prevNum FROM FAQ_TB) result1 WHERE faq_num=#{faq_num}

SELECT result1.* FROM (SELECT num,writer,title,content,viewCount,TO_CHAR(regdate, 'YY.MM.DD HH24:MI') AS regdate, LAG(num, 1, 0) OVER (ORDER BY num DESC) nextNum, LEAD(num, 1, 0) OVER (ORDER BY num DESC) prevNum FROM board_cafe
) result1 WHERE num=#{num}
